title: What champion can deal out massive damage?
body: I have been recently watching the worlds and have noticed that in team fights massive damage is dolled out. I have been wondering who is a good champ to deal out massive AoE damage tho the enemies. Any suggestions? Thanks in advance. ðŸ˜€

dude! you forgot renekton? I main renekton and its astonishing at how everyone underestimates the damage you do with this mighty croc. When he uses a furied attack jeez the damage is high. His empowered w stuns and can chunk down enemy health so well in lane

As a support main I've seen so many **Renektons** one-shot my ADCs XD But I didn't include him because the OP asked specifically for a _"good champ to deal out massive AoE damage"_.

While **Renekton** has got really good single target damage, I'm not sure if his AOE is that great. Especially compared to **GP**, **Kennen**, **Rumble** etc.

What your saying is kinda right, but renektons q does damage all around him, not to mention it heals for damage done, tripling that heal if if its empowered and tripiling that heal again if it hits champions. Also his ult does constant aoe.... I mean if a renekton e's into a teamfight, ults and then q's it is pretty good aoe and a very good fight started and engage for the rest of the team :D

Nunu can put out ridiculous aoe damage if you build him full ap glass cannon with his ult and Galio can put out stupid amounts of damage too. Full AP Fiddlesticks and Katarina also do alot of aoe damage.

I really want to like Nunu, but I find his ult stupid being a channel, because it always gets interrupted.
It can work well with Ryze, both ult and Ryze dumps Nunu right in the middle... otherwise I think his ult should be a charge up that cant be stopped (still gives time to get out of the area) instead of a channel.

pro tip: play {{champion:20}}  like {{champion:17}} . sit yo ass in a brush and chill... literally :P. ap nunu mid is my fun build for when i play norms. get points in q @ 1 and 7, then max last. Otherwise max e. By getting that 2nd point in q you can keep on one shotting minions for free sustain with passive. Alternatively max r > e > q > w and take some silly solo baron at like 20 mins (and later elder drag). 
With AP nunu your main goal is to be a lane bully, you'll always win trades because of ur q. later use your ult from brush to stop the enemy laners escaping when you roam. take biscuits for more e spam. And finally remember the old nunu adage: as nunu all you do is make the enemy jungler worse than you :P (this also applies to mid lane)
